Attributes.description: Introduces network concepts and methods for exploring social and organizational connectivity for work, socializing, and knowledge production. Examines impact of social media on connections that span space and place; peer production on authority structures; ubiquitous mobile connectivity on daily life.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Food,, Room: Nutrition
